Great photo from our field crew,.  Scanning a dam in Prescott, Arizona with our Leica P40.  Great job!
We are looking for Survey Crew Chiefs! Email your resume to careers@epsgroupinc.com.

I joined EPS Group to provide my experience in Cadastral surveying, highway retracement, ALTA, topographic surveys, results of survey, etc. EPS Group is expanding and growing their aerial mapping division. My experience as a licensed remote pilot will help with that expansion by providing drone technology to map various surveying and engineering projects. I look forward to growing with this company as we utilize new surveying technologies. I have always had a pioneering spirit and eager to try new things. EPS Group will provide me that opportunity to reach out and grow with the advancing surveying technologies.

Surveying Mathematics Made Simple, LLC was created in January 2016 to provide books, ebooks and mobile apps for the surveying, engineering, GIS communities and students of the surveying profession.  The Surveying Mathematics Made Simple series of books and apps are unique, modern and very affordable.

Prepare fee estimates, manage the survey staff and make assignments, monitored project budgets and schedule, prepared right of way plans, results of surveys, staking plans, final monumentation right of way plans.

Creative Computing 4 Windows (CC4W) was created in 2001 to provide custom software for the surveying profession. It has since evolved into writing and publishing books in the "Surveying Mathematics Made Simple" series. Mobile apps is an extension of the books. These books and apps are unique to the surveying profession.

Lead instructor for EVIT's new "Surveyor Apprenticeship Program". This formal apprenticeship training is registered and approved by: The US Department of Labor (DOL), State of Arizona Apprenticeship Advisory Committee (DES) and National Center for Construction, Education and Research (NCCER).
Public Land Survey System (PLSS), Federal interest lands including Tribal Lands

The CFedS program is a certification program designed to provide registered/licensed land surveyors and pre-registered/licensed land surveyors with training necessary to execute boundary surveys on or near federal interest lands, to basic federal standards.Continuing Education (CE) courses have been developed and a CFedS must pass 6 units per 2 years renewal cycle.

summary: I am very dedicated to the surveying profession. I like sharing my experiences with others in hopes that it will help elevate their surveying careers. My 35+ years in this profession has been very rewarding. I would encourage anyone who likes math, analyzing and solving problems, working outdoors, computer sciences, etc. to consider being a surveying professional.
name: Jim Crume P.L.S., M.S., CFedS
